original_text: He must take the two goats to the door of the Tent of Meeting. They are a gift to the Lord.
korean_text: 또 그 두 염소를 가지고 회막 문 여호와 앞에 두고

sentences.original_text: He must take the two goats
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 두 마리의 염소를 가져가야 합니다

sentences.original_text: to the door of the Tent of Meeting
They are a gift to the Lord
